data.title: Test Engineer
data.tasks: A Test Engineer currently specializing in manual testing, expanding my expertise in software engineering languages, tools and processes to enhance my technical proficiency and contribute effectively to quality assurance workflows.

data.title: Fullstack Developer
data.tasks: Collaborating with clients to build responsive web applications and modernise and enhance the user experience.

data.title: Junior Software Developer
data.tasks: Collaborated within teams to translate user requirements into actionable user stories, delivering and deploying high-quality MVP projects within challenging timeframes. A focus on development best practices and methodologies, including OOD, TDD, efficient code, comprehensive test coverage, discovery debugging and Agile practices.
